title: Bug 5231Add search for field read and write references
description: Bug 5231Add search for field read and write references Two new constants have beenadded on IJavaSearchConstants to be used when creating a field reference searchpattern: READREFERENCES: the search results contain only read access to a field.
OB: WRITEREFERENCES: the search results contain only write access to afield.If REFERENCES is used, then search results contain both read and write accesssto a field.
EB: The UI should support the following new JDT Core feature:Search for field read and field write references.
